alert.note: Alert for Wise (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 28 at 11:11AM EDT until July 28 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Central Wise County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1111 AM EDT, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Wise, Pound and Pardee. Route 23 and several other roads in the area are closed and impassable, if possible avoid driving in the area during the heavy rainfall. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
